pricingNote: Final price may vary by hair length/thickness and consultation. Prices shown are ‘from’ and may change by location.

services.name: Wash + Blow Dry
services.outcome: Lightweight volume, glossy movement, and a polished finish that lasts.
includes: Blow dry tailored to your finish
prepNotes: Arrive with hair detangled if possible.
Let us know if you need heat-protectant or styling preferences.
afterCare: Sleep on a silk scarf or pillowcase for longevity.
Use a light serum to keep ends smooth between washes.

services.name: Ladies Cut
services.outcome: A custom shape that frames your face and grows out gracefully.
includes: Dry or wet cut to your preferred shape
prepNotes: Come with hair in its natural texture for best shaping.
afterCare: Trim every 8–10 weeks to maintain shape.
Refresh the silhouette with a light edge-up as needed.

services.name: Wash + Cut + Blow Dry
services.outcome: A refreshed cut with smooth, bouncy movement and a camera-ready finish.
prepNotes: Bring inspiration photos if you have a new look in mind.
afterCare: Use heat protectant for styling at home.
Book a trim in 6–8 weeks to keep ends healthy.

services.name: Silk Press / Sleek Finish
services.outcome: Silky, sleek hair with humidity-resistant shine and fluid movement.
prepNotes: Avoid heavy oils or butters before your appointment.
afterCare: Wrap hair at night to preserve the finish.
Use a lightweight anti-humidity spray between washes.

services.name: Root Tint
services.outcome: Even, rich coverage with a seamless blend into existing colour.
prepNotes: Skip washing 24 hours before for optimal colour deposit.
afterCare: Use colour-safe shampoo to maintain vibrancy.
Avoid hot water for the first 48 hours.

services.name: Half Head Foils
services.outcome: Sun-kissed dimension with bright pieces exactly where you want them.
prepNotes: Bring inspiration images for placement and tone.
afterCare: Use purple or tone-safe products for brightness.

services.name: Full Head Foils
services.outcome: All-over luminosity with seamless, dimensional tones.
prepNotes: Arrive with clean, dry hair for the best lift.
afterCare: Use a bond-repair mask weekly.

services.name: Balayage
services.outcome: Soft, blended colour that grows out beautifully with low upkeep.
prepNotes: Book a consultation if you want a dramatic lift.
afterCare: Schedule a gloss refresh every 8–10 weeks.

services.name: Balayage + Root
services.outcome: Bright dimension with refreshed roots for a seamless, multi-tonal blend.
prepNotes: Let us know your last colour service date.
afterCare: Book a trim to keep ends healthy after lightening.

services.name: Deep Conditioning Repair
services.outcome: Restores moisture, softness, and shine in one restorative session.
prepNotes: Skip heavy oils for 48 hours pre-treatment.
afterCare: Continue with a weekly moisture mask at home.

services.name: Scalp Care + Massage
services.outcome: A clarified, balanced scalp with relaxed, nourished roots.
prepNotes: Avoid styling products the day of your service.
afterCare: Keep the scalp hydrated with a light tonic.

services.name: Smoothing Treatment (Brazilian style)
services.outcome: Long-lasting smoothness with reduced frizz and faster styling time.
prepNotes: Avoid colouring hair within two weeks of treatment.
afterCare: Use sulphate-free products for the first month.

services.name: Protective Styling Consult + Prep
services.outcome: Clean, hydrated, and ready for long-wear protective styling.
prepNotes: Let us know your preferred braid size and tension.
afterCare: Schedule a check-in after 4–6 weeks.

services.name: Braids (Starter ‘from’)
services.outcome: Long-lasting braids sized to your lifestyle, scalp health, and comfort.
prepNotes: Allow 3–6 hours depending on braid size.
afterCare: Moisturise scalp weekly with a light oil.

services.name: Wig / Weave Installation
services.outcome: Secure, natural-looking install with a seamless blend and comfortable wear.
prepNotes: Bring clean, detangled hair and your unit ready.
afterCare: Use a silk bonnet to protect the install.

services.name: Full House Weave
services.outcome: Removal, wash, cornrows, install, and style in one visit.
prepNotes: Arrive with your bundles ready or purchase in advance.
afterCare: Schedule a maintenance check after 3–4 weeks.
